DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study 9 patient undergoing standard-of-care clinically indicate carotid endarterectomy . The nine patient receive injection Indocyanine green ( ICG ) dose 0.25 mg/kg ( maximum 25 mg ) intravenous bolus . Immediately follow endarterectomy , resect specimen immerse normal saline . Ex vivo fluorescence reflectance imaging ( FRI ) immunohistochemistry perform . The investigator hypothesize compare control , ICG-injected patient demonstrate increase ex vivo microscopic ICG fluorescence signal within area plaque .
DOC.brief_title: Indocyanine Green Fluorescence Uptake Human Carotid Artery Plaque
DOC.criteria: Consecutive patient schedule elective carotid endarterectomy Massachusetts General Hospital Age > 18 year age . Signed informed consent . Exclusion criterion : Hemodynamic instability Any history iodide allergy Any history renal failure ( estimate Glomerular Filtration Rate ( eGFR ) < 50 ml/min/1.73 m2 ) Any history liver failure Any history bleed diathesis Any history cerebral vascular accident precede 3 month Pregnant lactating female .
